name: DotDetached
description:
DotDetached is a game where you have to leave your body parts to procces.

Made for GJL GAME PARADE FALL 2021

All assets including sprites, code, music etc are made by me.

A D - Move left-rigth

SPACE - Attach-Detach

W S - Move up-down (when detached)

Mouse hold and release - Throw your head

E - Talk

R - Reset

----------Whats Changed----------

  • Fixed some UI scaling issues.
  • Minor tweaks to musics.
  • Some level layouts are slightly changed.
  • Spelling mistakes :/
